result.arabic_text: تِلۡكَ حُدُودُ ٱللَّهِۚ وَمَن يُطِعِ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥ يُدۡخِلۡهُ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ وَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَوۡزُ ٱلۡعَظِيمُ
result.translation: 13.Tamah Yallih madqooqiy Yalli isi Naqoosah caddo kah hee kinni teetit tatre waanamkeh, Yallaa kee kay Farmoytih Amri oggole num Yalli Jannootay weeqaytitte guba как gexxa kaa Culse-le usuk teetil waarak, too galto is kaxxa Maffaafa.
